998.name: AA 309LP
998.Applications: Ceweld AA 309LP is used for welding dissimilar steels and 13%Cr/18%Cr stainless steels, and is suitable for welding the first layer on low carbon steel to obtain a AISI 304 clad layer.
998.Suitable_For: Buffer layers before hard facing, dissimilar joints between ferritic and austenitic steels and or difficult to weld steels such as: 42CrMo4, C45, 42MnV7, tool steels, heat resistant steels etc.
